name: ZethrDice

attributes.documentation: @dev Fallback function allows Ether to be deposited.

@dev Allows to add a new owner. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.
 @param owner Address of new owner.
attributes.name: addOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows to remove an owner. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.
 @param owner Address of owner.
attributes.name: removeOwner
replaceOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows to change the number of required confirmations. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.
 @param _required Number of required confirmations.
attributes.name: changeRequirement
submitTransaction

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows an owner to confirm a transaction.
 @param transactionId Transaction ID.
attributes.name: confirmTransaction

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows an owner to revoke a confirmation for a transaction.
 @param transactionId Transaction ID.
attributes.name: revokeConfirmation

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows anyone to execute a confirmed transaction.
 @param transactionId Transaction ID.
attributes.name: executeTransaction
isConfirmed
addTransaction
getConfirmationCount
getTransactionCount

attributes.documentation:
@dev Returns list of owners.
 @return List of owner addresses.
attributes.name: getOwners
getConfirmations
getTransactionIds

attributes.documentation:
@dev Gets the max profit of this game as decided by the token bankroll
@return uint The maximum profit
attributes.name: getMaxProfit

attributes.documentation: @dev Pauses the game, preventing anyone from placing bets
attributes.name: ownerPauseGame

attributes.documentation: @dev Resumes the game, allowing bets
attributes.name: ownerResumeGame

attributes.documentation:
@dev Sets the percentage of the bets that a resolver gets when resolving tokens.
@param _percentage The percentage as x/1,000,000 that the resolver gets
attributes.name: ownerSetResolverPercentage

attributes.documentation:
@dev Sets the address of the game controller
@param _controllerAddress The new address of the controller
attributes.name: ownerSetControllerAddress

attributes.documentation:
@dev Sets the name of the game
@param _name The name of the game
attributes.name: ownerSetGameName

attributes.documentation:
@dev Gets the game name
@return The name of the game
attributes.name: getGameName
resolveExpiredBets

attributes.documentation:
@dev Finishes the bet of the sender, if it exists.
@return int The total profit (positive or negative) earned by the sender
attributes.name: finishBet
maxRandom
random
execute
finishBetFrom
isBetValid

attributes.documentation:
@dev Retrieve the results of the last roll of a player, for web3 calls.
@param _playerAddress The address of the player
attributes.name: getLastRollOutput
